content.p: The University of Nottingham respects the rights and religious views of its students. If you need to make the University aware of potential impact on your study due to religious observance, you should follow the University's protocol relating to absence from an examination for reason of religious observance. If you would like to discuss any extenuating circumstance requests with a chaplain please contact us as soon as possible before your assessment or exam deadline bearing in mind the timescales as set out in the University's extenuating circumstances procedure. The Interfaith Network for the UK has a useful faith calendar with details many religious festivals and observances. The UoN Equality, Diversity and Inclusion Team have published an EDI calendar for 2024/25 to support everyone in our university community to plan for, participate in, celebrate, observe and remember key EDI-related events.
